All matters reserved for subsequent approval PART B: Full planning permission (Phase 1 as shown on the plans) for the erection of 181 dwellings and the provision of associated infrastructure (including roads, footpaths, cycleways and open spaces)

site-address: Land off Brownedge Road
notes: Network Rail is promoting the site's availability to deliver a greater density than suggeste in the Local Plan (210 as opposed to 60).. Planning permission does not currently exist for the residential development of the site but it could accommodate approximately 60 dwellings. Any residential layout will have to take account of the proximity of the railway on the southern boundary of the site. (Excerpt from Local Plan - adopted July 2015.)
